text: “Manmaghɨn amizɨ, nɨn suren gumaziba en ovaviba anɨngzir arazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨ? Egha me damasa uan dafariba ruer puvatɨ.”(15:2) Suren gumazibar dafariba bar mɨzezir puvatɨzɨ me api. Puvatɨ. Judaba Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzan atiatingi, egha bizir mɨzɨrɨzitamɨn suighan aghua. Kamaghɨn amigha me ghaze, me faragh uan dafariba ruegh, egh Godɨn damazimɨn zuegh, egh daghebar amam.
